author: rhogg@insider.com (Ryan Hogg)
description: The predictive model created by professors at the University of Chicago identified types of crime within a two-block radius with 90% accuracy.
title: An AI model predicted crime in US cities a week before it happened. It was right nine times out of 10.
content:
An AI model correctly predicted crimes a week before they occurred with 90% accuracy across eight US cities, the co-creator of the model said.
